features.name: Root Layout and Theming
features.description: Applies global styling, favicon, and theme colors for the SvelteKit app shell.

features.name: Dashboard Page
features.description: Main expense dashboard that composes form, KPIs, charts, and tables from the transactions store.

features.name: Transactions Store
features.description: Writable store that manages transaction entries, filtering, derived KPI metrics, and exposes mutation helpers.

features.name: Transaction Form Component
features.description: Interactive form with validation and dynamic subcategory options for creating new transactions.

features.name: Period Filter Component
features.description: Filter panel that selects presets or custom date ranges and syncs them to the transactions store.

features.name: Entries Table Component
features.description: Tabular view of filtered transactions with formatted values and removal actions.

features.name: KPI Card Component
features.description: Reusable card for displaying key financial metrics with accent styling and delta indicators.

features.name: Trend Chart Component
features.description: Responsive SVG line and area chart visualizing weekly income versus expenses.

features.name: Category Donut Component
features.description: SVG donut chart summarizing expense distribution by category with legend and totals.

features.name: Filtering Utilities
features.description: Date range helpers for presets, normalization, range summaries, and validation.

features.name: Formatting Utilities
features.description: Helpers for currency, ISO date, and compact number formatting.

features.name: Theme Utilities
features.description: Utility functions for referencing theme tokens and building color mix strings.

features.name: Domain Types
features.description: TypeScript definitions for transactions, filters, KPIs, and theming tokens.
